thread.title: Verdict in second case against industrialist Ragib Ali over tea estate fraud on Feb 26
thread.title_full: Verdict in second case against industrialist Ragib Ali over tea estate fraud on Feb 26

title: Verdict in second case against industrialist Ragib Ali over tea estate fraud on Feb 26
text:
Verdict in second case against industrialist Ragib Ali over tea estate fraud on Feb 26 Sylhet Correspondent bdnews24.com Published: 2017-02-23 15:23:13.0 BdST Updated: 2017-02-23 15:23:13.0 BdST Ragib Ali A Sylhet court has concluded a second trial in frauds committed by industrialist Ragib Ali and his sone over a tea estate. Related Stories 
The court of Chief Metropolitan Magistrate Saifuzzaman Hero has fixed Feb 26 for delivering the verdict. On Feb 2, the same court convicted the father and son of forging land ministry documents to acquire the Tarapur Tea Estate. They have been sentenced to 14 years in jail and slapped a Tk 10,000 fine each, failing to pay which will cause another three months in jail. Additional Public Prosecutor Mahfuzur Rahman said the court recorded testimonies of 22 witnesses during the trial. "After hearing the closing statements on Thursday, the court fixed the date to give its decision," he said.
